review: Consultation was genuine .The diagnosis of the problem was based on certain mindset which could have been better.

Please avoid this doctor. For my 85 year old grandfather he is suggesting knee replacement surgery. We were already having standing xray of knee still he asked us to take xray.  He was insisting me to convince him for surgery. He didn't even listened properly where was problem in knee and neither he was interested in seeing old report and injection which pain specialist has given. only one solution, knee replacement.

I described the issue related to the rib cage and shoulder pain due to a car accident injury.
Doctor asked me to get vitamin b12 blood tests done.
